description:
A new edition of Porto Digital Nomads Meetup will bring you lots of great vibes and new people to meet!

Come join us for a few beers, snacks and for some talks on being a digital nomad, expat or a local in the city of Porto! The panel discussion is still unconfirmed, but either way, it's going to be a ton of fun!

After a while, we'll all go downstairs to Bierhaus to continue our conversations over a cold one! :D

RSVP on the Meetup page: https://www.meetup.com/Porto-Digital-Nomads-Meetup/events/248225455/
name: Porto Digital Nomads Meetup
